## Content checklist

- [ ] No template placeholder text remains (no "Step 1", "Briefly explain", etc.)
- [ ] Summary is 3–5 original sentences (not copied verbatim from a source)
- [ ] Mechanism sentence is ≤ 30 words

## Claim and source checklist

- [ ] All factual claims carry `[Observed]`, `[Inferred]`, or `[Hypothesis]` labels
- [ ] All `[Observed]` claims have a matching entry in Suggested Sources
- [ ] No invented or unverifiable citations
- [ ] Citations include: title, issuing body, date, and link/identifier
- [ ] At least 3 sources in Suggested Sources (for draft+)

## Tone checklist

- [ ] No partisan framing, activist language, or moralizing adjectives
- [ ] Failure modes section is not asymmetrically focused on one political tendency
- [ ] Definitions match `docs/GLOSSARY.md` (or a glossary PR is linked below)
- [ ] Institutional, descriptive voice throughout

- [ ] All 7 required outline sections present and filled
